item.description:
Come workout & kick back from your stressful week with a 30 minute beginner Pilates Mat class with Connie Lafond followed by a glass of Pinot Noir.
A fabulous way to transition into your weekend with a workout & a little heart healthy red wine & meet some really great people!

Guys, I mean you males out there, this is a great way to check out Pilates!!!
"Your body weight is all you need to torch fat & build total body muscle". _David Jack, Director- Teamworks Fitness, Acton, MA
Men's Health Magazine, June 2012

Pilates improves flexibility & strength giving you a full body
workout. Proper breathing is emphasized contributing to stress reduction, & a centering mind/body connection.

Cost is $15 or two for $25 register at www.thebalanceyogastudio.com
item.name: Pilates & Pinot at The Balance Yoga Studio in Wakefield
